name: Prescription drugs; mail order opt out option
text:
A Hawaii employer-union health benefits trust fund health benefits plan shall permit each beneficiary to fill any covered prescription in accordance with chapter 431R. [L 2013, c 226, §3]
 
Note
 
  Applicability of L 2013, c 226; reports to legislature (2014-2015).  L 2013, c 226, §§4, 5, 8.
